sys_ux_client_script.name: View request redirection

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_e50b9f5a4704021078d46042d16d4398
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success Default copy">d10bdb1a4704021078d46042d16d4300</macroponent><name>View request redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId
    } = api.context.props;

    const route = "record_request";

    if (table != "sc_request") {
        table = table == "incident" ? "incident" : "task";
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table : "sc_req_item",
                sysId : api.data.look_up_records_1.results[0].sys_id.value
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-01 20:10:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>e50b9f5a4704021078d46042d16d4398</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>View request redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Can I go?" source="x_919555_can_i_go">9be8921a4700021078d46042d16d436f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Can I go?">9be8921a4700021078d46042d16d436f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e50b9f5a4704021078d46042d16d4398</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-01 20:10:56</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
